title: nextflow-htsget pipeline parameters
description: Schema describing parameters for the nextflow-htsget demonstration pipeline.

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline reads inputs and publishes results.

samplesheet.description: Samplesheet of records to fetch (CSV/TSV) â€” select a Seqera dataset or provide a path.
samplesheet.help_text: Pick a workspace dataset (text/csv) or path to a CSV/TSV containing id,name,filetype,uri columns.
samplesheet.errorMessage: Supply a CSV/TSV path without spaces ending in .csv or .tsv, or choose a matching dataset.

htsget_urls.description: Optional list of HTSGET endpoint URLs to fetch in addition to (or instead of) the samplesheet records.
htsget_urls.help_text: Add one or more HTSGET URLs for quick demos when a dedicated samplesheet is unavailable.

htsget_filetype.description: Filetype to assign to the direct HTSGET URLs (controls downstream QC steps).
htsget_filetype.help_text: Choose the filetype for manual HTSGET URLs so the appropriate QC steps run.
htsget_filetype.errorMessage: Select one of bam, fastq, or vcf for manual URL inputs.

outdir.description: Directory where the pipeline publishes result files.

workdir.description: Location for Nextflow intermediate work files.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to publish files from work directory to the results directory.

runtime_options.title: Execution settings
runtime_options.description: Resource limits and logging tweaks for local runs.

max_cpus.description: Hard limit for CPU requests across all processes.

max_memory.description: Hard limit for memory requests; format like '16.GB'.

max_time.description: Hard limit for runtime; format like '8.h'.

monochrome_logs.description: Disable ANSI colours in Nextflow log output.

metadata_options.title: Pipeline metadata
metadata_options.description: Labels surfaced in launch helpers and reports.

config_profile_name.description: Human-readable label describing the active configuration profile.

config_profile_description.description: Extended description for the active configuration profile shown by launch helpers.
config_profile_description.default: Run locally using the bundled Docker image

trace_report_suffix.description: Suffix appended to pipeline info filenames (defaults to current datetime when not supplied).

utility_flags.title: Utility flags
utility_flags.description: Helper switches mostly used for automation or debugging.

validate_params.description: Enable JSON-schema validation for parameter inputs.

help.description: Display a short usage help message and exit.

help_full.description: Display the full parameter help output and exit.

show_hidden.description: Reveal hidden parameters in help output.
